sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj storjeno
freely
, se dogaja pogosto ali v velikih količinah.

Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
can move or act freely
, ni nadzorovano ali s čim omejeno.

seg.quote: British goods were allowed to move freely from one state to another.

sense.def:
To talk freely
pomeni govoriti tako, da nam ni treba paziti, kaj rečemo.

seg.quote: We are all comrades here and I may talk freely.

sense.def:
Izraz
freely available
uporabimo za nekaj, kar zlahka dobimo.

seg.quote: These drugs are freely available in most cities.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is given or done freely
, je tisto dano ali storjeno prostovoljno.
